area.entry: Performs a local search in the Title and ID fields
Perform a server search for the M3 Companion. A more specific search query can be created here and the search result will also include a summary.

entry.name: capApplication
entry.comment: Translators: Module refers to an M3 module on the lowest level of the application hierarchy, such as 'Accounts Payable' or 'General Ledger'.

entry.name: tabIndex
entry.comment: Tab label. Index is a noun.

area.name: StringDictionary
area.entry: The search was not successful. Verify that you used only valid characters in your search.

entry.name: ApplicationsNotLoaded
entry.comment: $Content(Application refers to an M3 application (a grouping of modules) in the application hierarchy, such as 'Financial Controlling' or 'Supply Chain Execution'. The translation might differ from the generic translation of 'application' as in any computer program (in other words, we're not talking about MS Word or a similar application here).)

area.entry: The document could not be loaded since no S3 base url was available in the profile.
The document could not be loaded since no M3 base url was available in the profile.
